name: Jillanna Babb
text: Absolutely beautiful and well-maintained. A gorgeous venue! There is a lovely pavilion excellent for dancing, and the barn is spacious and perfect for events. Lovely property. I was there performing (belly dance) for a wedding and doing henna. The weather was perfect, too. Beautiful countryside.

name: Snowfall95
text: Truly beautiful, I met with Ms. Felicia and she was so helpful and answered all of our questions about the venue. I didn't want to take pictures because you definitely need to see it for yourself if you're looking for an event venue.

name: Donna Michola
text: Wonderful meeting! Elena is lovely, the venue is beautiful and very well maintained. So much to offer. Very classy

name: Alexis Humphrey
text: Our wedding was in August and it was extremely hot however when you go on the other side of the barn it cools down. They don't provide fans yet so if you are planning a summer wedding be prepared. When I first looked at the venue they didn't have a kitchen but they do now and it worked perfectly for us. Any time I needed help with something or finding something the staff at The Owl's Landing was on it. For example I couldn't find a sweetheart table that was a good price and they went out of there way to find one for me to use. They respond very quickly through email, text, or call. I highly recommend.

name: Steven Mills
text: Me and my wife had our wedding there in October of 2020 and it was perfect! Everything was exactly how we wanted it. The staff were extremely nice and accommodating to all of our needs. The barn was heated and the groom and bridal houses were extremely cute! It was the most beautiful place we found and was everything we wanted. We had an amazing wedding at an amazing venue with the help of amazing people! 10/10 would recommend to anyone looking for a beautiful place to get married! They are great!

name: greta oliver
text: I am mother of the bride and I was the wedding planner. Our experience at owls landing was amazing. We told them how we wanted it set up and they did all the work! Because of Felicia, Olivia, and Reese my daughters wedding day was perfect! They were there to check on us and anything we needed they were there to get it for us. The clean up was very easy. All we did was get our decorations and they cleaned up! It was absolutely beautiful!!

name: Christie Ross
text: From the beginning to the end, our experience in working with The Owls' Landing was AMAZING! The owners are wonderful to stay in touch and communicate important information. Our assigned wedding coordinator went above and beyond our expectations in providing guidance and support for our special day. No mater how trivial my questions were, the owners and wedding coordinator graciously answered them all. If you are looking for a wonderful venue at a reasonable price in a beautiful location, please consider The Owls' Landing.

name: Ashton Bailey
text:
Working with the family at Owl's Landing was honestly a dream experience.  We booked them during the Valentine's Day special they were running in 2019 for our June 2020 wedding.  I never had any issues with them; they immediately responded to my messages and put all fears at ease when I had them.
I was most blown away by how much they truly seemed to care about my then-fiance and myself as people, not just as a couple giving them money for a wedding.  When Elena and Owen would happen to stop by the restaurant I worked at, they would always make a point to come say hello to me.  When sharing news on social media, they were usually one of the first to wish me congratulations.
When we had to unfortunately downsize our wedding to less than 10% of what the original capacity was, they were so supportive of our decisions. The worst I felt when cancelling my "dream" wedding was knowing that I couldn't celebrate with this amazing family whom I began to feel really connected with over the two years we've known them.
This venue and the people that run it are a dream, and they are the only ones I truly recommend in this area with no doubt in my mind.

name: Tiffany Pettas
text: Absolutely beautiful venue!! I was just a guest at a wedding but from what I heard, the people that run the venue are incredibly helpful and friendly.

name: Amanda Thigpen
text: Lovely place and people

Beautiful venue and the staff was great!! Very well maintained and stress free!! My husband and I highly recommend Owl’s Landing for special events!! Thank you for everything!!

Steve & Brianna Childers

text: I unfortunately had to cancel my wedding due to COVID. The staff at the owls landing was so understanding. I would recommend them to anyone and everyone. It is such a beautiful venue! ❤️

text: Went to a wedding there to today. Absolutely gorgeous!

name: jill harris
text: My daughter ,Hannah Keller Johnson, was married there this past Saturday. The venue was beautiful! Weather was perfect ! But the owner and staff was what made this experience wonderful ! Especially Dawn Pettus and her family . She did everything from making my daughters bouquet (it was gorgeous!), cooking/warming up food, telling the DJ for me he was playing the wrong songs, packing up food for the newlyweds to take with them, and so much more !! Mostly I was reassured that if I needed anything, forgot something, any issue ... she would take care of it for me so I was able to relax and enjoy my daughters wedding !!  So I definitely highly recommend The Owl’s Landing if you are looking for a wedding venue !! ❤️❤️❤️

text: The Owls' Landing family is an absolute pleasure to work with. Not only do they work hard to make your event a beautiful day you'll always remember, but they go above and beyond to make you feel like a part of their family. Owen and Elena are wonderful people who consider every detail about their venue to continuously exceed your expectations. If you haven't yet, stop by The Owls' Landing today and meet this awesome family.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Destiny! We enjoy working with you, as well.

name: Sam Bass
text: The heart of the south from the west coast

name: Leslie Cheatham
text: Beautiful and serene spot! I spent the weekend at the Honeywood Valley lodge with a group of friends from college and it could not have been more perfect for us! We hope to make this a yearly get together. We had plenty of space to relax and catch up outside and inside, when it rained. I highly recommend it for your next event!

resp.text: We are so happy you choose to spend your girls getaway at Honeywood Valley. We loved having you and look forward to being an annual retreat you and your friends!

name: Megan LaRussa Chenoweth
text: We had a wonderful weekend at Honeywood! It was such an easy, quick drive from Birmingham but when you get to the property you feel so much farther away as it's so peaceful! We loved just relaxing & enjoying the beautiful scenery.  And we couldn't resist getting some spa treatments from the ladies of Fancy Face. It was amazing, they came to the property for the spa treatments so we didn't have to go anywhere! All in all it was a truly relaxing & rejuvenating weekend & we can't wait to go back!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing to spend your time at Honeywood Valley. We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful time and look forward to having you back anytime.

name: True40 Downtown Birmingham
text: We took a staff wellness retreat at Honeywood, and it was beyond incredible. The property and house are so beautiful, that you can be completely happy just sitting and relaxing for the duration of the stay, but Honeywood provides so many activities and amenities. We took a barre class in the barn, yoga on the deck, and enjoyed water activities like paddle boarding, canoeing, and kayaking. We spent sunset with wine watching the sunset on the expansive deck. There was plenty of space to sleep comfortably and privately. Honeywood would be an ideal venue for a number of different trips: a girls weekend, family getaway, corporate retreat, wedding, and more. You can make Honeywood your own while you're there, and we were so impressed.

resp.text: We are so happy to share this slice of heaven with you! It gives us such joy that you all were able to relax, retreat and spend time with your team growing, sweating and being in fellowship together. We are extremely thankful and grateful that you all enjoyed your stay with us at Honeywood!

name: Lynda Ratliff
text: Honeywood Valley is such a serene and peaceful place to go, unwind and truly rejuvenate. The accommodations are very well appointed with gorgeous rooms, plenty of space and everything you need for a true retreat.

resp.text: Lynda, thank you so much for your feedback. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay.

name: Zach Plunket
text: Amazing venue and great people. The entire property is well kept, managed and beautiful. Didn’t account for how far away it would be from any gas stations and I ran out of gas. One of the owners brought out a personal gas can and put 5 gallons in my vehicle.

resp.text: We were glad to have you! Hate to hear you ran out of gas, but we are happy to hear our team was there to assist when needed. Come back and see us again soon!

name: Allie Tittle
text: Hands down the most beautiful wedding venue I’ve ever been to! The views were incredible, the management and staff were extremely friendly, and the property was immaculate. 10/10!

resp.text: Thank you for your amazing review! We hope you come back to see us again soon!

name: Gaynell Tate
text: It was one of the most peaceful places I ever experienced

resp.text: We are so glad to hear that! We hope you come back to see us again soon!

name: Brandon Broach
text:
Yellow Branch is an amazing place. We’ve visited before for weddings and also come corporate events and every time it takes my breath away.  The owners are so gracious in sharing this little piece of heaven with others.

Watching the sunset from the deck or balcony over the lake just feeds my soul.

The hilltop barn is a refuge within a refuge. It’s a great place for reflection and quiet.

It truly is a gem in the Alabama hills.

name: Stephanie Brumbeloe
text: If you are looking for a unique wedding venue at a place that everyone will be excited about getting an invitation to, then Yellow Branch is the place for you. Just one wedding per weekend and you have the place all to yourself. An experience you and your guests will never forget! It's worth every penny!

text: Gorgeous scenery and hospitable owners!  Wonderful location for weddings, family reunions,  or business retreats!

This veteran DJ considers this venue very high on the list for local venue choices for a wedding.

resp.text: Thank you!!

When my new husband and I walked into our “shades of purple” theme wedding reception this past Saturday (02/15/2020) - we were simply blown away.  The decor spoke for itself.  Excellency and brilliance showed throughout the place.  We were amazed by the decorations and the theme that was portrayed.

Veronica has a very beautiful spirit and an easy person to talk to.  She makes it her business to make sure that you are satisfied with all that is getting ready to take place.  Thank  you so much Veronica and The Luxe Venue Center for making our wedding reception GRAND!!!

text: This was the best experience! Told my husband I was taking him on a date and ended up picking here to go. Neither of us had tried this before but the staff is SOOO helpful. Once we were comfortable, we were left on our own to throw. The two hour session was almost too much time cause throwing those axes are hot and tiring, but we had an amazing time. We have recommended to several and will definitely return! 👍🏻👍🏻

name: William Shaw
text: Didn’t know this place even existed until I found it on google maps. Decided to take my wife their for our valentines date. Was able t make a reservation for both of us and was greeted my great staff and dry silly humor while learning how to throw axes. Had a absolute blast as did my wife and definitely will have this place saved for future dates and hangouts with friends.

name: Brittany Brashaw
text: So much fun! Very reasonably priced for the amount of time you get to throw. Super big on safety which you want when the people around you are handling axes. Great atmosphere and a must go!

name: Allyson Lamey
text: This was soooooo much fun. I can't wait to go again. Grab your friends and give it a try. You will not be disappointed.

name: Graham Noble
text: This place is great! I went with my family, most of whom have never done it before, and just hung out and played some games. The workers were all really nice and were cracking jokes all the time. This place is great for like a family activity, or hanging out with friends.

name: Caitlin Harris
text: Had an absolute blast! The Nicks were great! Hilarious, friendly, engaging, and great coaches. Tons of fun! Will definitely be going back!

name: Mitchell Noble
text: First experience axe throwing, went with a group.  To start, you can bring your own food/beverages (including alcohol (within reason)).  Second, Nick & Nick were phenomenal coaches and host.   Third, they invested in top tier axes that lesson the learning curve significantly.  Overall phenomenal experience and I would highly recommend for anyone looking for something fun, competitive, and challenging to do.

name: Johan Arcenal
text: A very fun place to throw axes.

name: Joseph Fletcher
text:
Clean, fun environment after we got started. Good instructions from staff on how to throw.
We were there for a party, upon check in, the staff aggressively yelled at everyone to sign the waivers, probably because it was a  loud but they could work on the check in process. Also the person who organized it all, paid in advance based on a certain number of people arriving. Not everyone came and they wouldn't refund the difference back to her. Seems like a bad business practice especially at 20 per head. Don't pay in advance.
It's a good one time experience but probably won't do it again.

name: Kathleen Carraway
text: Had a great time our first time there. The lanes were separated by a chain link fence. Love that! Axes were easy for two out of the three of us to throw. Lol. We will most definitely be returning!

name: Madison Thompson
text: We had so so much fun! Us and another couple rented out an hour at the party rate. It was 1000% worth everything we paid. The gentlemen running it the day we went were so friendly and so supportive.

name: Kim Hughes
text: We had a blast! Super fun activity for groups. The team was very knowledgeable, fun, and attentive. The location is spacious, clean, and open. It's also nice that you can bring your own snacks and drinks. We will be back.

name: Alex Calder
text: Mobile finally got an Axe Throwing place! I was so excited to try this place out and it totally exceeded any of my expectations. They take your safety seriously, and they coach you on proper technique! The two men and lady who work there are SO incredibly nice and cool. Our friend group now has a new hangout spot for fun! Thank you, Strong Arm!

name: Titus Young
text: Had a great time! Will be back!

name: lauren liles
text: Great atmosphere and the two Nick's are awesome instructors. This is my second time visiting and will be back. Always a great time!

name: Corey Luker
text: Fantastic experience, came in a little late and all the lanes were occupied so we had to hang out for an hour or so, but so glad we did! The staff were so nice and helpful, 10/10 will absolutely be back again! I do recommend reserving your spot if you’re coming in on the weekend but I promise you won’t regret it!

name: Tony Scarbrough
text: They have axes and wood. You throw axes. They stick into the wood. A great place if you love axes or hate wood.

name: Shanna Bozeman
text: Great service. Friendly staff. Very fun. Would highly recommend you try it out.

name: Thomas Beck
text: Just stop by to have a chat with the owner. Nice couple of fellows, explained the business and we're helpful. One of the fellows ( can't remember the name) said it would be a a great inexpensive date night I would tend to agree. 🎯🍻 Don't forget to check out the website

resp.text: Thank you Thomas. I’m glad you had fun!

text: This place was so much fun! It was easy to book a time slot and the employees were so unbelievably nice. I definitely recommend it if you're looking for a fun activity!

name: Justin Kline

name: Blake Rowell

name: Aaron the Nomad
text: Blank is simply a cozy coffee shop that has great vibes. It is the perfect place to get a Quick coffee or just sit and do some reading. The environment is calm, peaceful, and always has some classic tunes playing.

name: Spencer Williams
text: Loved it! I was visiting from out of town and needed a place to chill. The two staff I met were super friendly and cool, they let us play board games while we hung out. Food options are limited to muffins, but they have a decent drink selection. Small comic and record selection, but a really awesome place.

resp.text: Out of towners are our favorites. You guys get it! We get you, too.

name: Andrea Lindholm
text: Keishun is wonderful and makes an excellent cup of coffee! Love it.

name: Jay B
text: Interesting collection of things being sold in the shop. Nice little place. I think a weekly group was there playing d&d at the only table in the shop. We ordered our drinks and left.

name: Chris West
text: I love the shop. Totally cool retro look. Love the patio area out back. The guys that run the store are great to talk to and know what they are talking about when it comes to comics and anything else they sell. They are super nice guys.

name: Timothy Green
text:
Came in for a coffee. Server who was going to prepare my drink wiped his nose audibly across his open palm while waiting at the register for my order. Gross. Hard pass.

Update: Check out the Owner's response to this review. Just lovely. I never ordered btw, just excused myself politely and left. Find coffee elsewhere mates! Ye be warned.

resp.text: I prefer to give people an OPPORTUNITY to wash their hands before PREPARING my beverage. Otherwise my daily triggering isn't as fair as the safe place Im constantly demanding.  Those computer screens, along with cash and cards are much grosser that you'd think. Washing hands before TAKING the order just creates the need to wash them again. We wash hands 100% of the time before making ANY beverages. ALWAYS HAVE AND ALWAYS WILL. But yeah, that's gross, and probably embarrassing to the guy attempting to take your order. Downright deplorable. You know that feeling right?  We've all been there and it ALWAYS happens at the worst possible time.  What matters though, really, is the recovery. I hate that you had to leave so abruptly though, as you missed the part where he washed his hands before preparing the drink you ordered. It was good too. I know because I drank it. We love you either way. Even when we don't meet your expectations. We will put your feedback to good use and make it a learning experience.  It is our mission to look to the past and improve the future!!

name: Scot McKinney
text: Super customer service, great coffee, awesome selection of records and comics. A great place to shop and hangout, plus the patio is sweet!

name: N Flippo
text: If the city of Florence was a store, this would be it... Great coffee and drinks (try the coffee milkshake), a varied collection of comics as well they are willing to order for you if they don't have something, and vinyl records from vintage to new. Definitely stop by to grab a drink and browse or sit on the back patio!

resp.text: Word is bond

name: Will Mitchell (Captain Will)
text: I may visit others, but this is MY comic shop.  It's a small place because they've just got started, but the folks are great, and so is the coffee.  There's lots of vinyl records, if you're into that sort of thing.  My wife and I stop in at least once a week, and they're making comic collectors out of the both of us!

name: Tiffany Kilburn
text: Absolutely amazing caramel macchiato, (not overly sweet like Starbucks) Patrick was very friendly and informative. Lovely Patio to just chill while enjoying your coffee. Will definitely be a added delight to my normal routine.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words Tiffany!

name: Toni Serpa
text: Not a lot of anything it states in its name, but more than you'll find anywhere else around for hours. Record selection is minimal, comic selection is mostly newer items, and coffee wasn't half bad!

resp.text: Love It!!! Not half bad.

name: Ashley Harris
text: Great coffee with lots of flavor! Nice to see another local coffee shop. Plus there's plenty to look at, books and board games for hanging out, and you can do your music/comic shopping all in one stop!

name: Chicknwings
text: I've been coming here for over a month now, and absolutely love the environment and variety they offer.

resp.text: Thank you Chicknwings. We work hard to provide a unique environment and experience. Also, we really love chicken wings. So by default, we really love you!

name: Spencer Lane
text: Love this little shop. Staff are always welcoming and talkative. Vinyls, comic books, and coffee. Nothing bad about it.

name: Penny Queen
text: Good music, nice people, very quiet and peaceful.

resp.text: The BEST music! We try as much as we can to specialize in local, regional, and projects tied to the Shoals area. Also harder to find, exclusive, limited edition records, along with lots of under the radar stuff.  Thanks for your support!

name: Todd Beene
text: Fantastic locally owned comic, music, and coffee spot. The backyard is a crucial hang. Get some coffee, buy something, and spend some time out back for a great day.

name: ubermonkeyking
text: This is the best comic shop we have in this area. Guys are great and love their smoothies.

name: Andrew Lewis
text: Great selection of coffee, comics, and music including vinyl.  Nice patio to relax at.  Support your local record store!

name: Max Tew

Thank you for your feedback. We will continue to do our best!

Go grab a beer and let the kids wear themselves out on the playground. And when you go tell them Bird sent ya.

name: Nicole Beaver
text:
UPDATE 2: The owner has changed their response 3 times already and has not once denied being drunk while working! I will also note on the positive side that the venue lets you have food delivered and will let those with food allergies bring their own food, which is quite nice. The music was also pleasant without being overwhelmingly loud.

UPDATE: it turned out was actually the owner who was quite drunk!

The "owners friend" was very invasive and no one wore masks.  There was a good variety of canned beers but not much on tap. Generally nice outdoor setup with a children's area.

resp.text: First, I would like to remind you that the mask mandate in Alabama has been lifted. Second, I’m sorry you felt that I was invasive but we do not allow outside beverages, nor do any other establishments.

Gene and Kelly, the owners, are absolutely wonderful.  They were so helpful and made us feel that they wanted our daughter's wedding  to be as special as we did.  They went above and beyond in making a beautiful memory for our family.

text: My husband and I got married at Blount Springs Chapel and everything was perfect. The chapel is absolutely adorable with an excellent reception space. The owners of this venue are beyond kind, helpful, and tried to make our day as easy and carefree as possible. Gene and his wife went out of their way to help us with everything we wanted and needed. Thank y’all for being so good to us and making our most important day the happiest one yet! God bless you both!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We were very blessed to have you all here! We celebrate your beautiful wedding and the first day of your happily ever after!

name: Zanthia Rodriguez
text: I just had my wedding at Blount Springs Chapel, and it was absolutely gorgeous! The location is beautiful, and the owner is very prompt and helpful. If you are looking for a small, dreamy wedding in the woods, Blount Springs is perfect. The Chapel itself and the staff are great, definitely 5 stars, but there are a couple things that were a little inconvenient. One thing is that there is not a good place to get ready. That wasn't a problem for me- I only had one bridesmaid, and we did everything except getting dressed, elsewhere. Also, the reception area doesn't hold everyone, so we had to set up tables outside. Those things didn't detract from the wedding for us and our friends, but it's something to keep in mind. If you are wanting a small, beautifully aesthetic wedding, this is the place! It was perfect for me and what I had dreamed.

The chapel was beautiful and the reception downstairs that followed could not have been more convenient. The caretakers are the most accommodating people you will ever meet.
As you can tell from this lengthy review, You need to "come and see" for yourself!
We made lasting memories here, NEVER to be forgotten!

name: Mike Breeding
text: I was sorely disappointed in the birthday party we scheduled. The party was scheduled 1:00-3:00. We showed up around 12:50 assuming it was going to take 10-15 minutes to get all 6 kids setup and ready to play. Unfortunately that wasn’t the case. The kids didn’t get setup and playing until around 1:40 (leaving only an hour to play).  At 2:40 the kids we sent into the party room to eat pizza and open presents.  At 2:50 the guy came in to inform us that we had to be out of there within 10 minutes.  Keep in mind that we paid for 2 hours of playing for the kids and it took 45+ minutes before they all could start playing. The guy that was working informed us that it normally isn’t this troublesome and he wasn’t sure what was wrong  ( we even had a PC crash in the middle of a game within 5 minutes after we finally got it up and running). I will say the only positive to the experience was how nice the staff was but for $275 I expected to at least get an hour and 40 minutes of playing time before eating and we only received maybe an hours worth.  Not worth the money that was spent.

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear this. If it is okay we would like to contact you and offer 1 hour of free gaming for each child who attended.This is not our standard for our parties and we are so sorry. We do hope you give us another chance to redeem our store. We hope to speak to you soon.

The restaurant has custom made pizzas, subs, salads, wings, soft drinks, 20 beers on tap, and a few wines too!

name: Carlos M. Fernandez
text:
UPDATE 6-11-21 This business is truly worthy of a ten (10) Star rating! Once again they have come through in a professional, technically competent, and competitively priced manner. I had the barrel of my 20 gauge shotgun cut down to the regulatory length for home defense (18.5") and it came out perfect. The weapon looks like it just came out of the box! Truly a professional and talented job by the resident gun smith's! Thank you to all. Your results may vary.

BREAK

Should be in the 10+ Star club! I was extremely impressed with my first interaction with your staff. Erin (Counter Lady) and Gerald (Gunsmith) pulled it together in a timely manner installing a P365 Safety Conversion Kit on my weapon. The work was done in minimal time resulting in me feeling much safer with 12+1 configuration. Customer service was without par, quality of the work was perfect and the pricing was very competitive. Wishing you guys the best in biz. Stay safe, be alert. Best. CMF sends...

name: Chris Knight
text:
I stopped in today to test fire a new mossberg 88 I picked up. Had a hard time finding ammo before I arrived, but they happened to have a couple boxes of ammo i could use.

The staff is friendly, courteous, and very informative. They take the time to explain what it takes to fire at the range with ease, and have a cushy waiting area to view a quick training video. The whole process was smooth and easy.

The range safety officers are well on their game. I felt safe the entire time on the range, and they were able to quickly explain the touch screen track interface, and further explaining that safety is a top priority.

I signed on for 30 minutes, and decided to fire my .40 before testing the shotgun. The touch screen interface has me sold on coming back to bullet and barrel. With just a click, the target goes the exact distance. Takes all the guesswork out of the experience.

I fired my pistol, and was pleased with the range itself. The design is new and clean. And with the RSOs keeping an eye on everything, it's a great environment to enjoy your firearms.

I tried the 88, and it performed beautifully. I added some extra cushion due to a shoulder injury. For those that would ask, you can't shoot bird shot here. But you can fire buck shot and slugs. But I'll tell you, it's fun firing a shotgun at this range.

Afterward I wandered around and struck up conversations with some of the staff, and showed me a selection for sale. I was impressed with the inventory, as well as pricing. I see myself buying my next firearm from here.

For me, it's a bit of a drive from Madison. But good business is where you find it, and Bullet and Barrel is my newest one stop shop for all things firearms. Plus, open on Sunday!

Dont take my word for it, stop in and check them out today! I'll be back soon, keep up the good work guys.

resp.text: Thank you for coming down! Please come back soon and....May the force be with you ;)

name: Karen Smith
text: State of the art range! The employees are always friendly and helpful - from the sales team to the RSOs! Everyone is very professional and committed to ensuring the safety of everyone who walks through the doors. I would absolutely recommend this place to any of my friends or family without hesitation!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Please come back soon!

name: JonPaul Wise
text: I recently moved to Huntsville and wanted to find a new class 3 place to call my "local shop". This place is a perfect example of how to do things right, treated me like I was a long time customer right from the start and after just a few visits I feel like I've been coming here for years. Very veteran friendly and the facility is far beyond just a gun shop. I've lived in 8 cities over 5 states in the past 10 years and this place is on the top without a doubt!

name: Justin W (JdogAwesome)
text: Extremely well maintained and high quality range! The firearm rentals where great and the guns where in pristine condition! The range officers where super nice and helped us a ton as it was my first time using a pistol. Can't recommend this place enough!

name: Adrian Farrales
text: Bullet and Barrel is a great place! They have a wide selection of firearms and a very nice indoor range, but what I like most about this place is that they offer excellent classes relating to firearms. Jeff is one of the staff members there and he is a great teacher. The folks working at Bullet and Barrel are experts and they'll make sure you get everything right. If you're looking for instructional classes on anything related to firearms, then Bullet and Barrel is definitely the place!

name: Lynn Watts
text: Took the handgun cleaning class with Jeff.  It was very informative.  I learned how to disassemble, clean and reassemble a firearm.  The tip about the grease was especially good since I have trouble at times with pulling the slide.  Thanks for the exceptional training.

name: David Norg
text:
Needed my scope mounted on a new rifle.
Made the mistake of taking it to another popular local business to get it done. Clearly was not a professional installation.
Gerald with Bullet and Barrel reinstalled the scope and rings on the spot and did it right!
Great people and service!

name: Carrie Givens
text:
I just made the best investment today, my new Wilson combat edcx9l firearm and I love It. Jeff was extremely helpful and the experience was awesome. I just started taking classes, and Jeff made sure I knew everything that I needed to know about the firearm before I left. He was very patient, considerate, and knowledgeable. Thank you Jeff, you’re awesome!
- C T Davis

name: Marquiz Liner
text: Can’t recommend Bullet and Barrel enough! The staff is very knowledgeable and extremely helpful! The range is clean, well-maintained, and well-managed by the excellent RSOs. Everyone we’ve encountered has been super nice! If you’ve never been, I highly recommend you check them out! They’re awesome!

name: Telia Norg
text: Just had a scope remounted correctly.  Took to another gun shop and they apparently had no idea what they were doing. As soon as we showed the clerk the firearm he immediately knew what was wrong. This is our place from now on.  Thanks

name: Hilary Crimmins
text:
Nice clean and well ventilated facility.
But honestly it is overpriced, and has extremely long waits. Members get preference and can be observed jumping the line before non-members for range access. I've even had a staff member tell me that they only had 4 boxes of ammo left and would only sell to members.
Today we, two of us for one lane, arrived at 2:15pm and paid for 30 minutes on the range. We waited well over 2 hours and did not get our full 30 minutes because they were closing. It's not worth it.

resp.text: We totally understand the frustration. We were extremely busy today as I'm sure you saw! With everything going on in the firearm industry we are trying to do everything we can. But we do have members who pay a monthly fee and part of that benefit is jumping the line. Kind of like Disney! We would love for you to give us another opportunity. Please reach out to me, Louis, at 256-384-4867 and we will make sure you have a 5 star experience

name: Joyce Maxwell
text: Had a wonderful experience Saturday with my daughter's. Took a class with Tommy, can't say enough about his wonderful teaching skills. We were nervous but with Tommy's great personality it wasn't long till we were calm and enjoying ourselves. Thank you so very much. We'll definitely be back!!

name: Andrew Emmerton
text: I took a private lesson with Jeff and he was very knowledgeable, I highly recommend taking a lesson. The rest of the staff were also great and they have a great selection of firearms for sale as well as some to rent for their indoor range.

name: Chad Jones
text: Louis and the crew at bullet and Barrel are first rate and so is their facility.  I've had some minor gunsmithing done as well, mainly to check suppressor alignment and get a few breaks lockset on, service has been fast and very affordable.  I've had a few problematic firearms inspected as well and John, their gunsmith, has always been straight forward and accurate.  Of the range facilities in the area, BnB stands head and shoulders above the rest.  I have range passes to go to other ranges for free, but I would rather spend some money at BnB to be with a better crowd and make sure their level of commitment to the average gun owner is rewarded.  When it comes to stores that are in your corner as a gun owner, these guys are bar none best of the best in our area.

name: pauline bracken
text: Sarah did a fantastic job teaching me how to firearm! I actually would give her 10 ⭐️ Since I haven’t in years!! I probably will take another class before I actually buy a pistol! Thank you again for your patience and spending over 2 hours with me! I had a wonderful time!!

name: Catherine Stower
text: Sarah was a wonderful instructor!  Her patience went above and beyond what I would have expected from an instructor, and her knowledge is tremendous.  In addition, she is continuing to work with me to help me figure out the best firearm for personal use.

name: Steven Gaffin
text:
I went because I was having the hardest time removing the retaining pin from the firing pin of my Remington 870. So I took the bolt down to Bullet and Barrel. Front Desk (not really front more like back left corner) staff was very welcoming and friendly. The gunsmith was able to remove the pin and lathe down a manufacturing defect in it that was keeping it in the bolt.
I was very satisfied and impressed with Bullet and Barrel and will definitely return for the many other services they offer.

name: Chad Jones
text: Louis and the crew at bullet and Barrel are first rate and so is their facility.  I've had some minor gunsmithing done as well, mainly to check suppressor alignment and get a few breaks lockset on, service has been fast and very affordable.  I've had a few problematic firearms inspected as well and John, their gunsmith, has always been straight forward and accurate.  Of the range facilities in the area, BnB stands head and shoulders above the rest.  I have range passes to go to other ranges for free, but I would rather spend some money at BnB to be with a better crowd and make sure their level of commitment to the average gun owner is rewarded.  When it comes to stores that are in your corner as a gun owner, these guys are bar none best of the best in our area.

name: pauline bracken
text: Sarah did a fantastic job teaching me how to firearm! I actually would give her 10 ⭐️ Since I haven’t in years!! I probably will take another class before I actually buy a pistol! Thank you again for your patience and spending over 2 hours with me! I had a wonderful time!!

name: Steven Gaffin
text:
I went because I was having the hardest time removing the retaining pin from the firing pin of my Remington 870. So I took the bolt down to Bullet and Barrel. Front Desk (not really front more like back left corner) staff was very welcoming and friendly. The gunsmith was able to remove the pin and lathe down a manufacturing defect in it that was keeping it in the bolt.
I was very satisfied and impressed with Bullet and Barrel and will definitely return for the many other services they offer.

name: Catherine Stower
text: Sarah was a wonderful instructor!  Her patience went above and beyond what I would have expected from an instructor, and her knowledge is tremendous.  In addition, she is continuing to work with me to help me figure out the best firearm for personal use.

name: MaryAnn Green
text: Took a beginner's gun safety class.  Sarah was my instructor and was extremely knowlegeable.  She answered all my questions and gave me good advise on how to properly handle a fire arm.  She provided helpful hints on the firing range.  I plan on meeting with her again for more instruction.

name: Steve S
text: Excellent instruction and advice from Jeff White! He is extremely knowledgeable and taught me a ton of tips to correct my technique. Thank you so much! It's just a great facility. Clean, professional, helpful.

name: Ethan Brewer
text: Alberto is the man. Great customer service. We talked about many different guns. He knew the product, and I could tell he was genuinely trying to help me.

name: Eugene Mayo
text: My first visit to Bullet & Barrel was a very pleasant experience. I expected the normal indoor gun range with no frills and a lack of management personnel for the amount of customers. Not at Bullet & Barrel! You enter the establishment and find yourself in a first class gun store with very tastefully displayed products. When you check in to the range most of the paper work is done electronically and there are plenty of well trained staff on hand to help you, not only at check in but on the range also. Defiantly not a Mom & Pops business. Top notch!

name: J Cowan
text: Great place for learning how to shoot or just for practice. My husband and I visited and enjoyed it. Truly learned at lot from our instructor Sarah. She was very knowledgeable and very patient. We learned so much. She walked through every detail with us together and separately, as we each own two different guns. Highly recommend! Thank you Sarah!! We will be back.

name: Dorothy Loftin
text: Thank you Tim for a great lesson on learning to get comfortable with a gun! I was with my sister and friend, both of whom had experience with guns.  Tim tailored the class for all 3 of us with varying abilities.  I had never touched a gun and was shooting with multiple guns by the end of the session.  The best part of it all is now I’m comfortable with the gun we have in our home.  Thanks again Tim!  We will definitely be back for more lessons!

name: Randy Chavez
text: Went in the is morning for the first time to sight in my hunting rifles. WOW!  Got hooked up with George and he did it all. Helped me sight in four rifles is one hour, explained everything he was adjusting and just made the experience unbelievable. Couldn't have asked for anything more. Thanks George!

name: Emilee Taritero
text: My twins took the Youth Marksmanship Class  with Sarah as part of their 13th bday weekend. She was amazing! She was so patient with the group of kids. She explained everything very well and made sure the class understood all the points of gun safety and operation which allowed them to have an amazing time once they got the hands on experience on the range. My twins DID NOT want to leave.  We will definitely be back!

resp.text: Thank you do much!!! Sarah is a great instructor! Please come visit us again soon!

name: vivaswanth c
text:
Great range. Courteous people and very encouraging trainers.
Modern equipment and look. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! Please come back and visit soon :)

name: Nelly Belly
text: Best range in Huntsville.... and it’s not even close. I became a member when they were still building it because I knew it would be a great place and they have exceeded my expectations. The ranges are well lit and spotless. The thickness of the barriers between the ranges was a major selling point to me. I feel safe and secure when I am on my lane. The range masters are helpful and add another layer of protection for the customers/ members that are throwing lead at a target. I strongly suggest you give Bullet and Barrel a shot (pun intended) if you are looking for a place to shoot. Beware, this place can become addictive.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! We appreciate your continued support

name: diane rigsby
text: A friend and I took the first steps class from instructor Sarah.  Sarah gave great instruction emphasizing safety first.  She was very patient.  I learned A lot and will go back in the future.  Also the facility was very clean.

name: Jasmine Tucker
text: If you’ve heard about this place and have not stop by, WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? This place is awesome! It’s clean, and there’s safety videos which made me feel safe and my favorite part was that the staff made me feel comfortable. I encountered Sarah who is so patient and knowledgeable. This was my first time using my new .380 and she encouraged me to practice more with it and not be discouraged. Just when I thought the place couldn’t get any better I even had the same experience as I exited by Pam she’s so sweet she explained to me about how to become a member. This place sells everything too!

resp.text: Thank you so much!!! Please come back soon 😃

name: Larry Parker
text: Excellent facility. Great instruction on gun safety and usage from Jeff White. Highly recommend Jeff for a private or group lesson.

resp.text: Jeff does an awesome job!!!! Please come visit us again soon!!! And let us know if we can help you further

name: Ivica Ristovski
text: This is a very good place. Staff is super nice. Clean building, very nice shooting range. I would say best in town. Perfect for pistol shooting.

resp.text: Thank you!! All of lanes are also rifle rated as well!

name: Clint Beavers
text: The staff is very knowledgeable and friendly. Sarah answered all my questions, demonstrated gun safety, and made my first time experience an enjoyable one.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!!! Sarah is a great part of the team! Please come see us again soon

name: Zachary Talley
text: This is the best gun shop in Alabama. Fastest and most professional service. I dropped my gun off with new scope John amd Alberto had all the necessary mounting hardware in stock.  1 hour they mounted ,bore sighted and zeroed in at there 100 yard range. EXCELLENT SERVICE and very well trained gun smith and employees.

name: FryingPan
text: Got a membership to this place and its worth every penny. Excellent range officers and all very professional. The ranges themselves are very clean and ventilated. There is ample space for any weapons you want to bring. They have a huge selection of weapons to rent (free with membership) which was one of the big selling points of the membership for me. Once you shoot here you won't go anywhere else again.

resp.text: Thank so much! We appreciate you joining the family!

name: braxton guthrie
text: Extremely respectful over the phone was very refreshing, normally because of my age (21) I'm in between being treated as an adult and an adult.

name: david schachle
text: If you are looking to learn how to shoot, I highly reccomend Jeff. He is very nice and profesional. They have a clean range and store. Very fun experience.

name: Bryson Hill
text:
After going to three other places in Huntsville and the big box store across from Bridge street that has the street named after them along with there sales add and waiting in line for hour two find out that they did not have one or ever had one.
For now on Bullet and Barrel has my business best prices in town Thomas was my sales person he was a great help . Everyone was very nice I encourage anyone that is in the market for firearm visit Bullet and Barrel

name: donald reimer
text: Very clean, safe and very nice range people are very helpful and friendly no attitude will definitely return when back in town

resp.text: Come back and see us! Travel safe

name: Charles Pruitt
text: The staff is friendly and knowledgeable, and the gun range is awesome. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, if you're looking for a place to shoot, try them out. They've definitely earned my business.

name: Galvin Freeman
text: First visit here to shoot and I was very, very impressed with the entire staff from start to finish! This place has that it factor and has lots of potential to become a gem here in Huntsville! The indoor range takes it to another level. Definitely recommend checking this place out! You won't be disappointed! I enjoyed my visit and will be back.

resp.text: Please come back soon!

name: J B
text:
First, I must say that the range facilities are quite nice with helpful staff. The range facilities are up to date, very comfortable and the RSOs are very professional.

However, I made the mistake of using the gunsmith services. This has not gone well. This particular saga has been going on since the end of November. I always had to call or email them to get any status and the answer was always the same...it will be ready Saturday, it will be ready next week, it will be ready "sometime next week". I do not believe that they have devoted any significant time to my project. The first time I checked in with them after a week, that is when they informed me I needed to bring in other components. They never reached out to me. Very frustrating. Now that it is in Jan I have given up working with them and I am now taking the project somewhere else.

I get the feeling that they want to work on things when they feel like it, have no obligation to provide status or time estimate to the customer. Furthermore, I do not believe that they have fulltime gunsmiths which feels a little misleading from the website.

So if any readers know a professional, hardworking gunsmith in the area I am certainly looking!

resp.text: Hey JB! we're so sorry this was your experience. Normally our Gunsmiths can offer quick turn around times. Some thing may change that with parts availability and waiting on other parts we need from our customers. I am sorry we were back logged at the time and when we received your receiver in late December we began to diagnose the problem. But again that's no excuse for a lack of communication. Please let us know if we can be of further assistance

name: Andre Harris II
text:
Went to buy a light for my handgun and I received quick and friendly service. I was also lucky enough to receive a small discount while I was there.
Clean and an open environment also

name: Ethan Owens
text: A truly epic indoor shooting range. Truly the best in Alabama. Seriously. Plus I don’t have to worry about lead poisoning or negligent discharges by employees. They’re prices are really decent as well. Not the cheapest but well worth the price because of the great value they represent.

name: Sara Bozeman
text: Jerrell, the gunsmith, literally saved my weekend. I went in on a Friday needing to sight in a new rifle before going hunting for the weekend. My mounts were machines improperly and couldn’t hold a zero. Jerrell skipped his lunch to fix my mounts, and did an amazing job. The rest of the staff was very helpful, kind, and generous with advice. I love how clean and fresh the facilities are as well. Not many gun ranges are so well kept! I’ll be going back, and definitely using Jerrell for any work I need done on a gun.

resp.text: We love our gunsmiths!!! Please come back and see ya soon!  😀

name: Kenyon Stone
text: Such a great place! Staff very helpful and friendly. Brought a 12 year old, they had some options for her, and were making sure she enjoyed herself as well. Tim was a great help, felt very welcome

name: Caitlin Thomas
text: Such an enjoyable experience.  Highly recommend Bullet & Barrel

name: Destiny Freeman
text: We had such a great time here! Friendly, knowledgeable, and attentive staff. The range and facilities are very well maintained and clean. Wonderful range and personable people. Win win. Thank you!

name: DAN From the SOUTH
text: This is by far my favorite shooting range to use in Huntsville! Very friendly environment and extremely kid friendly. My son always says "Bullet and Barrel" when I ask him where he wants to go!! Well done guys!

resp.text: Thanks!!!! We like to think we're all a big family 😀😀😀

name: Matt Ray
text: No better place in Huntsville to buy a silencer.  You can even use it in the range while waiting on the government.  Silencer shop kiosk makes the process super simple, and the staff are excellent to work with.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Mike K
text: I took Louis up on his offer of a tour of Bullet and Barrel as my previous experience was less than stellar.  The experience this time was quite the opposite of my last visit; even before I met Louis.  I was greeted as soon as I entered the building and was pointed in the right direction to meet Louis.  The tour was thorough, and as suspected the facilities are top notch, and they offered quite a bit more than I expected.  The gun range is state of the art and the RSO's are extremely helpful.  The staff is friendly, professional and quite knowledgeable .  Thank you Louis, and the entire Bullet and Barrel staff for an exceptional experience.  I most definitely will be back.

resp.text: Mike, I am so sorry that this is what you experienced with us today. We pride ourselves on giving our customers an awesome experience. As our reviews reflect that this is not our norm. But I'd love to personally invite you back and I'll give you a behind the scenes tour of our facility. Thank you for the feedback and we truly hope we can deliver a 5-star response on you next visit. If you'd like to set this up my personal email is louis@bulletandbarrel.com~ Louis, General Manager

name: Rick Morgan
text:
Jason did an excellent job teaching me how to shoot. He caught and corrected all my aiming problems.
A really great teacher!

name: Thomas Webber
text: I have been to Bullet and Barrel many times. Always a great time and the staff treat you right. Best place in Huntsville!!!

name: Danta Simonsen
text: My son and I took a gun safety class and had a great time. The instructors were knowledgeable and made the class fun without loosing the seriousness of what we were there to learn. Tim took extra time to help my son making him feel confident. He was very encouraging no matter how bad my aim was. Excellent service, great facilitie. Highly recommend.

name: Michael Mauro
text: Hands down, the best Gun Range I've ever visited. I've lived across 5 states and have visited ranges in each one. This one has, by far, exceeded my expectations in all areas. The staff are immensely helpful, friendly and professional. Thank you for your clean facility and expert staff!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words!!!! And for bringing us some cool guns to work on~louis

name: Bridgette Bradley
text: We had our corporate event here. The employees were simply wonderful! Everyone was very knowledgeable and cared about each person in attendance. The facility is immaculate! The shooting range itself is the best in Huntsville. Highly recommend Bullet and Barrel!!

name: Jacob Boyett
text: Went in as a newbie shooter and within 2 minutes of being in the range Dave stepped up and immediately told me things I could correct and even went so far as to give me some drills to run. I would recommend Dave and B&B to anybody. See you guys next week!

name: Barrett Eimer
text: Great range to shoot at with nice lanes and technology; they have a decent selection of quality guns and rifles too. They also sell apparel for men and women.  It comes together as a welcome and unique blend of ideas for a place to shop.  There is a ton of space and it will be cool to see how they intend to make use of it all.

name: Weston Hall
text: What a fun professional place! Very clean and the staff was very friendly. They weren’t intimidating and was nice when I asked them questions.

resp.text: Thank you so much! Please visit us again soon!!

name: Ira Merritt
text: I have used the range at B&B  a number of times and the staff is always friendly, helpful, knowledgeable and safety conscious. I also recently did a trade and had gun smithing done on an AR. My interactions have all been very satisfactory. John, the gunsmith, and others went far out of their way to resolve a non-standard hardware problem in a way that I greatly appreciated. Great staff and operation.

name: Jay Graham
text: My wife and I shot guns for the first time. We had an excellent experience. We took a personal class from Colt, a fantastic instructor! He is very knowledgeable, explains things clearly, and kept us feeling confident throughout the entire process. We're already looking forward to our next visit.

name: Miki Heaton
text: First time to visit this range, very nice facility and clean well maintained range. I would have given it 5 stars if not for two things. When we walked in the door two employees behind the counter were on their cell phones and didn’t look up until we spoke. Then when we walked on the range the range officer was also on his phone. In each case neither were talking only looking at the screen.  I personally have a problem with employees being on their phones at work but on a firing range just seems like a really bad idea.

name: Will Booker
text: I drove all the way across town to get there still in line for 5-10 minutes they let two people in front of me go on to the range and then told me that they just took the last person on the range and turned me away. It wasn't covered related because they weren't busy. I won't be going back thanks for nothing

resp.text: Thank for leaving this feedback! As you can see typically the strong majority of our guests have 5 star experiences. Talking this over with our team we looked back at your trip. We do have a pretty firm rule on not allowing shooters on the range 30 minutes before we close. The folks who went ahead of you are some of our members and one of their perks is lane priority. We would absolutely love for you to give us another chance and I would like to invite you back as my guest and comp you your range time. ~Louis S.

name: Matt White
text: I am so happy with the experience I had shopping for my gun parts and my new purchase of the noveske space invader! They have answered every question that I have had. I usually give a name to ask for but theres no need in this best gun/shooting range in north alabama! Everyone is very knowledgeable. This place is amazing!

name: Matt Hamblin
text: Great staff and an amazing range. Oozes professionalism and safety. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Come visit us again soon

name: Ariel Eisenstadt
text: Lots of fun, friendly staff very helpful. Terrific selection of rental firearms very fair pricing

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! Please come visit us again soon and if there is anything we can do please let us know~Louis

name: Pat Shores
text: Great place to shoot!  Awesome service and staff especially the range officers.  They were both friendly and helpful all while being professional.  This was my first trip but it sure won’t be my last!

name: Seth Webb
text: These is the best range in North AL. The range is well lit, climate controlled, and each lane is very spacious. But the best part are the people who work here. I cannot give enough praise for my favorite place in Huntsville.

name: Ron Volinski
text: First time at a gun range. The staff was very helpful and accommodating.  Very nice place and the people are friendly and attentive.  Jason was really great with helping me with gun control and site alignment.  Great experience!

name: Caleb Hollingsworth
text: Never thought I would go to an indoor range again after a poor experience at Larry's range. The range here is nice and well lighted! Love it!

resp.text: Thank you! Come visit during the holidays!

name: tim watson
text: Nice and friendly staff. Clean and well run. Will definitely go there again.

resp.text: Thank you so much!!! Merry Christmas and we look forward to seeing you soon

name: alfred keely
text: The facilities are very nice, clean,  and comfortable. The staff are also very nice, and knowledgeable. It was an outstanding experience. My wife and I will be back.

name: Tom Copeland
text: Great place.Great people. Wouldn't think of going anywhere else.

name: Wayne Roddy
text: This a real nice place. The staff is very friendly, the decor and range is super clean.

resp.text: Thank you so much Wayne!!! Please come back soon

name: Mandi Harbour
text: Me && my husband went today and talked with a guy name Jeff. Let’s just say we WILL NOT be going back. He was rude and his costumer service was trash 🗑 this place won’t last long at all with the prices and the non friendly staff such as Jeff!

resp.text: I do apologise that this was your experience! This is so strange to hear because Jeff is one of our most lauded employees. Although we do apologise that we didn't meet your expectations I'd love to discuss your experience. Please call me on Tuesday at 256-384-4867 ~Louis GM

name: Jack Stripling
text: This place is awesome! Loved the rifle range. Great experience. I'll be back!

name: Anthony Williams
text: Came in looking for a gun that they had out of stock. One of the workers really helped me  out by looking for the weapon at other stores. Then helped me understand the paper work process. One thing that stuck out to me was friendly customer service and needs of the consumer met.

name: Louisa G
text: State of the art facility.  Super friendly and comfortable environment.

name: Paige Burchel
text: Precious ladies items - jackets, tees, hats, scarves, etc...not to be missed!

resp.text: Come again! We have a great sale going on!

name: Dean Hammer
text: Very clean place and helpful staff! Will return!

name: Dave Rausch
text: Well maintained facility & Staff

name: Jason Denny
text: You range does include a 100 yard range. However, put the fact that it is CLOSED ON MONDAYS on you site!!!  What a waste of time!

resp.text: Jason I am so sorry for the inconvenience. We are closed on Mondays so we can keep Bullet and Barrel to our high standard of a clean and safe range. However we do have our hours posted on our Website as well as here on Google and Facebook. But please come in tomorrow and we'll give you a 5 star experience

name: DM M (DMM)
text: Amazing!!

name: Susan Hoskins
text: Great place to visit!!!!!

name: Charlie Donner
text: Very nice

name: Alisha Black
text: It was decorated so festively. The caterers were fantastic and we had professional bartenders at this function. It was wonderful!

name: MEM Thomas
text: Good people, great live entertainment. Food was hearty, hot and delicious.  They moved 240 people through the food line in less than 20 minutes.

name: Lana Porter
text: Food was comfort food ! Show was ok! definitely will go back

name: Crystal Mateyko
text: Loved this place they helped out in every possible way to make our wedding day special. Even added a few decorations that we had forgotten. I thank them so much for all the help and wonderful memories we had there. Even though as the bride and the groom we didn't get to eat much food. The ones who did said the crab dip was wonderful. Thanks again for making our day special.

name: Carol Barnette
text: We took 24 Lacey's Springer's there today 24 Jun. Great fried chicken and roast dinner with 2 salads baked beans rolls cake tea coffee and lemonade. We celebrated veterans. Than had that wonderful entetainer Kevin Adams. You couldn't ask for More.

name: Jean Thompson
text: Loved the food and getting together with new and old friends to enjoy the great entertainment.

name: Bill Edwards
text: Nice place, good food, good folks, great entertainment.

name: Julia Hale
text: Love what this place does with their lunch matinees.

name: mdhsabh
text: Great food, entertainment!  Christmas show and lunch, $15 today and tomorrow!

name: karla Barnes
text: Best place to be ever! Ya'll missed it.

name: Dallas Letson
text: Great food and entertainment.

name: Janet Sapp
text: Awesome place

name: Michael Chunn
text: Always a very fun time

name: Joshua Bane

text: Having our daughter's wedding at Adams Acres was an absolutely amazing experience from day 1! The venue is beautiful inside and out and the staff went above and beyond to ensure that we were happy with every detail.

name: Stacey driver
text: My daughter, Summer and her husband Will were married at Adams Acres in February of 2020. They were one of the first few couples to ever be married there! This venue is the absolute best! It is located on private property in a secluded country setting away from high traffic areas giving you a serene and peaceful setting! The sunset pictures at Adam’s Acres are a must because I don’t think you can get a more picture perfect setting. The rustic decor and set up inside and out also make for the perfect background for pictures! The owners go ABOVE AND BEYOND to make your special day perfect!  From the first walk through to the final minutes of the wedding day (clean up time) Brittney Adams, her husband, and their wonderful tribe of helpers were the most gracious and supportive hosts! Brittney and I kept in constant contact from the very beginning! She gave me so much helpful information from how to set up the venue to the best priced insurance coverage to use! She made the stressful things that people don’t always think about when it comes to wedding planning extremely easy! The day of the wedding when we were still decorating, she and her her husband were there willing to move things around, hang things, decorate things, and even loaned us an industrial steamer for the bridesmaids who forgot to steam their dresses beforehand! From beginning to finish  Adams Acres made the entire experience an absolute beautiful memory for everyone involved! We can never thank them enough for making our youngest daughter’s wedding dreams come true!

resp.text: Their wedding was so stunning! Every detail was absolutely perfect! The best part was getting to know you guys! Y’all are so genuine and fun! We had a blast celebrating your daughter!

name: Erin BeidlemN
text: We recently used Adam’s Acres as the venue for our daughter’s rehearsal dinner, wedding and reception. Brittney and her husband are both so kind and accommodating! They were always available for questions and truly made this special time as stress free as it could be. They have really thought of everything! We have received countless compliments about the venue and recommend them whole heartedly!

name: Vanessa Rexford
text: We had our wedding at Adams Acres this past weekend. It was stunning and everything I had always dreamed of. The venue was gorgeous, and needed very few decorations to give a simple, elegant, rustic ambiance. Brittney and Anthony were so great to work with and were so accommodating when we had to postpone our wedding due to COVID in May. It's the most beautiful venue of its style in the area, and we couldn't have asked for better people to work with.

resp.text:
Thank you so much Vanessa! Your wedding was beautiful and one of our favorite moments was when your daughter joined in on your first dance! Your family was so much fun!
Thank you so much for choosing us! Best wishes to you and William!

text: As a wedding planner, there is nothing better than finding other vendors that you adore working with and let me say Adams Acres is one of them! From the first wedding I did there Brittany and Anthony have made me feel like family from the start! They go above and beyond for every single bride, family, & guest to step foot on their grounds! I always look forward to wedding days there knowing my brides have been given the best treatment possible!!

The owner Brittney is so sweet and kind, she has been so helpful during this Covid-19  Pandemic,  when we couldn't have our planned Anniversary event,  she jumped right in and offered us another date, even into 2021 ,that really meant a lot to me. Every business has suffered during this time.When you have made plans and things happen beyond our control, we need more professional people like Brittney to keep us calm, and reassure clients that everything is going to be okay, and she has our backs. Thank you so much, I will I could give this venue 100 stars if I could. The customer service top notch. Book them, you can't go wrong. Mrs. Thornton

name: Madison Ingram
text:
I would not recommend this venue if my life depended on it! Do not sign a contract with Adam’s Acres, and do not trust them. Adam’s Acres has been operating for less than a year. I was the first bride to book Adam’s Acres. I booked them when all that Brittany Adam’s had to show was studs and pictures of what it would look like when completed. I took a huge risk and trusted Brittany. Now, I regret that decision.

Due to the COVID shutdowns in March, I was forced to postpone my April wedding. All of the dates I had to choose from included holiday dates or August dates. We picked August 15th thinking that COVID would be over by then. However, COVID-19 cases are worse now than they were in April. After a lot of praying and talking to relatives, a month from our wedding, we made the decision to postpone our wedding again! This is not at all what we wanted to do, but for the safty of our family and friends we felt it was necessary. Brittany, being the heartless person she is, refused to give us another Friday-Saturday date in 2021. She offered a Sunday date with our rehearsal dinner being on a Thursday. That would not work for religious purposes and the fact that we have so many out of town guests.  She said “we would cut into her 2021 revenue if she gave us a Friday-Saturday date”. The only way we would be able to have a Friday-Saturday date is to pay the new 2021 rate of $3500.00 when we have already paid in full of $2500.00. Not only will she not let us postpone to a Friday- Saturday date in 2021, she refuses to give us a refund.

She has stolen our money and has taken advantage of the COVID-19 situation!! Do not book here!! Check out Magnolia Bay, Serendipity, Windmill Station, or The Grand!! Stay clear of Adam’s Acres and Brittany Adams!! Learn from my mistake!

resp.text:
We are so sorry that we were unable to find a compromise that worked for both parties after your cancellation. COVID-19 has been a nightmare for everyone and we understand your frustration.
When the State of Alabama shut down all businesses we rescheduled affected couples. It was heartbreaking for our couples and incredibly difficult for our small business that had been operating less than 6 months. We were so happy to have Fall dates still available, but we will be very honest...it has been difficult trying to recover from all the bookings we lost because of reschedules, especially when we didn't qualify for any assistance. We are thankful that unlike a lot of businesses we were able to survive and didn't have to close our doors.
When we rescheduled you to August 14th/15th, we held that date for you and turned away other couples and parties that contacted us for that date. Unfortunately when you cancel 3 weeks prior, it is impossible to re-book.
We have been open and safely hosting events again since May 30th. Every single couple has been dealing with the uncertainty of COVID and taking precautions to keep everyone safe. We offered to discuss these options with you as well. The mother of the bride tonight told us, "I know it wasn't as big as they planned, but they are finally married and we felt SAFE." Yesterday’s couple rented additional tables to put outside to further socially distance. All weddings have provided masks and had hand-sanitizer readily available. Tonight's bride also live-streamed her event so that her grandmother (who could not attend because of her assisted-living's COVID policies) could watch her get married. Vendors are wearing masks, caterers are hiring extra staff to safely serve everyone, our venue has extra staff at events for sanitizing... Everyone is making compromises and working hard to keep everyone safe.
We are in no way downplaying the seriousness of this virus. We also have no idea when it will end. We understood the reason for your cancellation and although it goes against our cancellation policy, we were empathetic and offered you a Sunday date in 2021 with no additional payments required. When you told us that interfered with your religion, we again offered for a Monday-Thursday. We are so sorry that none of those options worked for you.
Weddings are such an emotional time for everyone and we understand your disappointment. We know that all couples and wedding vendors alike have been thrown into incredibly difficult situations. When what you want to do for your couples conflicts with how you have to run your business--it feels impossible. If we let one person reschedule, we would have to do it for everyone to be fair. We are so sorry, but we simply cannot do that and keep our doors open. We have to follow our cancellation policy in this situation.

name: Yaak18
text:
Updated to include Class Action Lawsuit contact information!

My Daughter scheduled and paid for a wedding. Due to Covid shutdowns ordered by the Alabama Government,  the wedding could not be performed.  It wasn’t my daughter’s fault and it wasn’t Adams Acres fault.  In this case a reasonable person, in other words,  not a crook, would refund the deposit (full payment of $4000) to my daughter.  The owner, Crooked Brittney Adams,  refused to refund the money.  Her contract is iron clad to screw the customer no matter what happens.  She claims to be a Christian and puts off a wholesome,  caring demeanor but In my opinion she’s a scammer just like so many in today’s world.  Don’t trust her! Do not sign a contract with Brittney Adams and don’t give her any money.  She will steal it from you.

Update:  I have been contacted by other disappointed customers of Adams Acres and we are planning a Class Action Lawsuit against this fraudulent business.  If you have been victimized by Brittany Adams please send us an email at AdamsAcresClassActionLawSuit@gmail.com

We have a Dothan Law Firm ready to proceed.

Thank You.

resp.text: We are so thankful that out of the 9 brides affected by COVID at our venue, 8 have them have successfully been rescheduled. Two of those rescheduled weddings have already occurred at our venue since the restrictions were lifted. COVID has created such an unprecedented set of circumstances. While it hasn't been ideal for anyone, we have had open and honest communication throughout the process. Only 1 bride out of those 9 affected refused to communicate with us via phone and requested that communication be only between our attorneys. We honored her request. All brides affected were offered comparable Saturday dates and we even offered to extend those date options into 2021 if they still desired a Spring wedding. For those who were in school-- they were offered dates while school was not in session including dates during the Summer, Fall break dates, Winter break dates, and of course Spring 2021. We always try to work with our brides and their families and will continue to offer alternative dates for the 1 bride who has not yet rescheduled. We know that trying to plan a wedding during COVID has been very difficult and we are here to help with that process as much as we can.

name: Willie Brazile
text: We booked an anniversary dinner for my parents earlier this year.  As Covid-19 worsened over the year, we had concerns about hosting the event due to family members having suffered from disease and us not wanting to create a super spreader event.  When trying to cancel in the summer, DesignLab held firm to their no refund policy even during pandemics.  Most legitimate companies have been flexible and accommodating to understand concerns of their customers to allow cancellations or at least postponements.  Understanding we live in a capitalist society, it is still frustrating to see local businesses elevate profit over basic decency and concern for local customers.

name: Debelle Swoope
text: October the 12th was an amazing day.  We had an amazing time at the Design Lab.  It was our daughters wedding reception.  Everything about this place was amazing.  Matthew the assistant at the design lab is wonderful.  Cheryl Ann assisted with the setup and she was amazing and Faith was the connection .  She was amazing as well.  .   The mill room was huge and didn't require much because the room was gorgeous already. We didn't mind paying for security.  There's alot going on in the world today so, we embraced the security.   Thanks Design Lab Staff for making our event amazing.

name: Makeda Lathon
text:
This place is not managed well.
Everything is a extra cost like paying for security on the weekends or at night and having to pay for your setup time.
On the day of event they called me an hour before set and told me there was no air and they don’t have control over it. This delayed my event and they didn’t return my deposit of $200 plus because I supposedly went over but they didn’t take into account the issues I had with the air or me having to rent 6 fans due to it being so hot in the room!
The communication is always delayed and before you sign their contracts be sure to have everything explained because there are hidden issues in the contract!
Never again!

name: Daphne A
text: Just know that once the contract is signed they will not do an addendum.

resp.text: Hey Daphne! We can do an addendum, but were unaware you were interested in making any changes! Please email us if you would like to make a change so we can complete that!

text: Went at night for a date party and they tried confiscating my real ID and were very rude and condescending towards me when I insisted it was real. I challenged them on it so, reluctantly, the bouncer let me in but said it would be “just this one time”... so if it had been a fake ID, he would have just let it go?? Not to mention, had to wait a long time for mediocre drinks.

resp.text: Sofia, I would like to apologize for how we made you feel. That said, the security team deals with and see a lot when it comes to checking for real and fake ID's. Thank you for the opportunity to serve.

I already miss this beautiful place!
